main event: A pilot sighted a round object flashing red, white, and green lights while flying over Cincinnati, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 21 minutes,The pilot was flying at 41,000 feet when the sighting occurred,The object appeared to be about 15 miles west of the pilot in level flight,The pilot pursued the object for about 200 miles but it gradually pulled away,Three other aircraft also reported seeing the same object.
sighted object: round object with flashing red, white, and green lights
witness description: Lt. Bradley from the 165th TAC Recon Sq. Kentucky Air National Guard and three other aircraft crews.
